link.script: window.setTimeout(function () { document.title = "Home - Jefferson County School District"; }, 500);

li.a: Instructional Resources for Students and Parents

div.p: Welcome to the Jefferson County School District's website! We are elated that you are visiting the site and hope that you find all the information and the well being of our students that you are looking for concerning Jefferson County School District. Whether you are a parent, student, prospective or current employee, or even perhaps an industry representative exploring the possibility of locating in our area, we hope that you find our commitment to education to be one of the endless possibilities. Thank you for your commitment to public education. Together we can and will continue to keep Jefferson County School District moving forward.

br.p: Update: The Jefferson County School District will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

div.a: Jefferson County School District secures dollars to improve student achievement

br.p: Jefferson County School District secures dollars to improve student achievement.

div.a: JEFFERSON COUNTY ELEMENTARY SCHOOL PRESENTS ITS 2019-2020 TEACHER OF THE YEAR

br.p: The Jefferson County Elementary School is excited to announce Mrs. Tomekia Wise as its 2019-2020 Teacher of the Year.
